metadata.title: CVE-2019-8679 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in iOS 12.4, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, tvOS 12.4,Safari 12.1.2, iTunes for Windows 12.9.6, iCloud for Windows 7.13, iCloudfor Windows 10.6. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead toarbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
